projects.name: SimpleBlog
projects.description:
A mini blogging platform.

Functionality:

  • browse/post/edit/delete/blog posts
  • search(full-text) blog posts
  • user profiles
  • follow/unfollow bloggers
  • send private messages
  • message notifications

projects.name: Filmogram
projects.description:
A social network similar to instagram/flickr.

Functionality:

  • browse/post photos
  • like/unlike photos
  • comment on photos
  • user profiles
  • follow/unfollow other users
  • notifications (when someone likes your photo)

projects.name: LeicaRentals
projects.description:
Backend for a lens rental shop.

Functionality:

  • manage lens catalog
  • manage customer catalog
  • manage rentals

I have future plans to add admin authorization.
